house_listing.house_description: This single family home built in 1983 has 3 bedroom(s), 2 full bath(s)/1 half bath(s) , 3 car garage. Rooms include dining room, family room, master bedroom. Features include view, private pool, private spa, patio, fireplace, skylights.

residential_listing_-_feature_details.rooms: Dining Room, Family Room, Master Bedroom

house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Breakfast Room, Cable TV, Ceiling Fan(s), Dishwasher, Library, Pantry,Skylights
